name: Mahjong Kittens
description:
The ancient solitaire Mahjong game at it's finest! Choose from a gaggle of Kitten-themed backgrounds, tilesets, and layouts. Ask the computer to reveal the best moves. Backup moves and save your current game for another time. Play guaranteed winnable or totally random games. Keep track of your playing time and other game stats. WARNING: This game is addictive!

This special edition features adorable Kitten-themed backgrounds and tilesets!

Features:

* Kittens-themed graphics
* 51 layouts to play
* 10 kitten backgrounds
* 5 kitten tilesets
* Computer hints feature
* Backup moves button
* Save game and restart games
* Soothing soundtrack
